name: The Narrows
description:
Are the strange tales of The Narrows true?

Is it really haunted?

Discover the sad tale of Love Lost Meg in this strange short choose your path interactive comic photo story, and find all 4 endings.

Estimated play time: 10 minutes

Created as part of The Midnight Detective Club project.

HOW TO PLAY

Click the options on screen to progress through the tale.
